statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:WAFv2WebACL) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:WAFv2WebACL)-[r:ASSOCIATED_WITH]->(n) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:WAFv2WebACL)-[r:ENFORCE]->(:WAFv2APIRule) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
